Objects

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Objects.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card
    RoomArea represents a room on the board. It is made up of room squares on the which correlate to those on the board, players in the room and its entrances.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the room
        hasSecretPassage - true if there is a secret passage, otherwise false
        image - the image label for this room

                             RoomSquare square,
                             javax.swing.ImageIcon image)

        Parameters:

        square - the RoomSquare to use for map displaying
        image - the image use to draw on the board

      • setSecretPassage

        other - the other RoomSquare that use to remove/set player's position
